channel.title: Friends in high-dimensional places
channel.description: Recent content on Friends in high-dimensional places

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a fullstack software engineer and data scientist. My background comes from a mixture of math and cognitive scientist. In college I started off in pure math before stochastically drifting into data science and then doing research in human and machine learning processing. Now I’m purely in the machine land.

item.title: Cleaning private information from free text fields
Projects
item.description: Engineering Data science Inside of work, I collect and analyze various forms of usage data for the Search function in Epic’s software. Outside of work, I occasionally do side projects analyzing other datasets out of curiosity and to keep my skills fresh. One such project is analyzing Tyler the Creator’s tracks for various attributes using the (public Spotify API)[https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/] as a data source. You can read about this project here.
